name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi生誕祭2022 【ゲスト：ときのそら ⧸ 星街すいせい】 [y3Ed1eCwuOA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Tokino Sora perform the song 'Kurenai Chronicle'.
Short break/transition with a black screen.
MC segment where AZKi and Sora introduce the next song.
AZKi and Tokino Sora perform the song 'Miren Record'.

subtitles.original: 打ち砕け
subtitles.english: Smash it to pieces

subtitles.original: 僕らの存在はバーチャルで
subtitles.english: Our existence is virtual

subtitles.original: 代わりなんていないリアルなんだ
subtitles.english: But it's real, with no substitute

subtitles.original: だってこの魂は本物だ
subtitles.english: Because this soul is the real thing

subtitles.original: 打ち砕け、理不尽も常識も
subtitles.english: Smash it to pieces: the injustice, the common sense

subtitles.original: 壁を越えて　高らかに
subtitles.english: Go beyond the walls, loud and clear

subtitles.original: 果てない赤、胸を貫く脈打つ血汐になれ
subtitles.english:
Endless red, become the pulsing lifeblood
that pierces my chest

subtitles.original: 愛しさや切なさを覚えていくの
subtitles.english: I'm coming to know love and sorrow

subtitles.original: 創り出すほど確かなハーモニー
subtitles.english:
The harmony that becomes more certain
the more we create

subtitles.original: これは生きた証だから　聴かせてよ
subtitles.english:
Because this is proof of having lived,
let me hear you

subtitles.original: 聴かせてよ　ふたり歌いあう
subtitles.english: Let me hear you, two voices singing together

subtitles.original: 美しく燃え上がる炎よ
subtitles.english: O flames, burning up beautifully

subtitles.original: あぁ、御空へと咲く花よ
subtitles.english: Ah, O flower blooming towards the great sky

subtitles.original: 互いに目を見合わせて
subtitles.english: Exchanging glances with each other

subtitles.original: 互いに手と手重ねて
subtitles.english: Placing our hands on top of each other's

subtitles.original: 共に歌え　叫べ　今
subtitles.english: Sing together, shout together, now

subtitles.original: 果てない藍、僕ら貫く消えない記憶になれ
subtitles.english:
Endless indigo, become the indelible memories
that pierce us

subtitles.original: 愛しさや切なさは抱えたままで
subtitles.english: While still holding onto love and sorrow

subtitles.original: 辿り着くほど確かなメロディ
subtitles.english:
The melody that becomes more certain
the further we go

subtitles.original: これは生きた証だから！今も聴こえている？
subtitles.english:
Because this is proof of having lived!
Can you hear it even now?

subtitles.original: 聴こえてるよ！ふたりだけの歌だよ
subtitles.english: I can hear it! It's a song just for the two of us

subtitles.original: 次の曲はそらちゃんの、未練レコードを一緒に歌いたいと思います！
subtitles.english:
For the next song, I'd like us to sing
Sora-chan's 'Miren Record' together!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's get pumped up!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set, go!

subtitles.original: まだほんのちょっと未練がましく
subtitles.english: Still feeling just a little bit of regret

subtitles.original: 君が好きだった歌をかけてみる
subtitles.english: I try playing the song you used to like

subtitles.original: 重たくなった針は時計回り
subtitles.english: The hands that have grown heavy turn clockwise

subtitles.original: ただ空回った歯車がひとつ
subtitles.english: Just a single gear spinning in vain

subtitles.original: あーだ　こーだ　ストラトの
subtitles.english: Saying this and that, the Strat's...

subtitles.original: 泣き声が響いた
subtitles.english: Cry echoed out

subtitles.original: 私の名前なんて忘れていいよ
subtitles.english: You can just forget about my name

subtitles.original: ひらり舞い散る花のように
subtitles.english: Like a flower fluttering down

subtitles.original: だけどいつかこの歌を聴く時は
subtitles.english: But someday, when you hear this song...

subtitles.original: ねえ、隣に誰かがいたこと思い出して
subtitles.english: Hey, remember that someone was by your side

subtitles.original: お幸せに　なんて最後の言葉
subtitles.english: Saying 'Be happy' as your final words

subtitles.original: 無理につっぱねて笑ってみたけど
subtitles.english: I tried to force a laugh and push it away

subtitles.original: 私と付き合っていた頃よりも
subtitles.english: More than the time you were with me...

subtitles.original: 幸せになって欲しくはないのよ
subtitles.english: I don't want you to be happy

subtitles.original: あーだ　こーだ　バスドラが
subtitles.english: Saying this and that, the bass drum...

subtitles.original: 心を蹴飛ばした
subtitles.english: Kicked my heart

subtitles.original: 初デートの写真もペアリングも
subtitles.english: The photo of our first date and the matching rings...

subtitles.original: 簡単に捨てられたらいいのに
subtitles.english: I wish I could just throw them away easily

subtitles.original: 胸に刻まれた歌声のせいで
subtitles.english: Because of the singing voice etched into my heart

subtitles.original: また君の笑顔思い出してしまうんだ
subtitles.english: I end up remembering your smile again
